description:
Fujimiya tries to catch Takafumi`s attention. Takafumi`s uncle shares a seemingly romantic memory he experienced during his time in the other dimension.
Source: Netflix

titles.title: On a souvent besoin d`un plus petit que soi
Tsurai Naka Omae ga Ite, Sasaete Kurete Yokatta
You Helped Me Through Tough Times
つらい中お前がいて, 支えてくれてよかった
